reuze

Class al_LearnerDecisionTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • reuze.al_LearnerDecisionTree
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    al_i_Learner
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    al_LearnerDecisionTreeStump

    public class al_LearnerDecisionTree
extends java.lang.Object
implements al_i_Learner
    Uses DECISION-TREE-LEARNING from page 702, AIMAv3, to induce decision trees (see DecisionTree).
    Author:
    Ravi Mohan, Mike Stampone, Andrew Brown

      • getMostImportantAttribute

        public java.lang.String getMostImportantAttribute(java.util.List<java.lang.String> attributeNames,
                                         al_Examples examples)
        Find the most important attribute; this method corresponds to "argmax_(a in attributes) IMPORTANCE(a, examples)" on page 702, AIMAv3. IMPORTANCE is implemented as the information gain of the attribute, see page 703.
        Parameters:

        attributeNames -
        Returns:
